documents.document: Go after your dream, no matter how unattainable others think it is. -Linda Mastandrea
Look at your problems as problems & they'll continue to hold you down. See them as blessings in disguise & that's what they truly become.
I'm gonna make the REST of my LIFE, the BEST of my LIFE.
Don't stress. Do your best. Forget the rest.
You can never do a kindness to soon because you never know how soon it will be too late. -Ralph Waldo Emerson
Keep dreaming. https://t.co/Rw2YXIF7zm
Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after another. - Walter Elliott
The brick walls aren't there to keep us out, the brick walls are there to give us a chance to show how badly we want something. -R Pausch

RT @TheDaiIyPuppy: Only they understand that puppy love! ;)

RT @Inspire_Us: Never let your fear decide your future.
Opportunity follows struggle. It follows effort. It follows hard work. It doesn't come before.
Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
In this life we cannot always do great things. But we can do small things with great love. -Mother Teresa

In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
If you can be anything, BE KIND. https://t.co/shjsofP6uO
The most precious possession that ever comes to a man in this world is a woman's heart.
Impossible is not a fact, it's an opinion.
RT @WomenOfHistory: Some of the best advice. https://t.co/i8oGOjjhEi
When you make a commitment, you build hope. When you keep it, you build trust.
Always have hope. https://t.co/Cibg9ljxnh
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out. - Robert Collier
It is not joy that makes us grateful. It is gratitude that makes us joyful. -David Rast
May your life preach more loudly than your lips.
Judging a person doesn't define who they are, it defines who you are. https://t.co/Vsr1c6WWzo
RT @llovmydog: The i am cute but not interested face https://t.co/Mqae1UO2Fs
Success is not counted by how high you have climbed but by how many people you brought with you. - Wil Rose
Take control of your emotions before emotions take control of you...
Very true. https://t.co/xKaYsGSSND
Good things come to those who believe, better things come to those who are patient, and the best things come to those who don't give up.
A person who chases two rabbits catches neither. #stayfocused
FORTUNE FAVORS THE BOLD https://t.co/fZoUERuuct
Ninety-nine percent of the failures comes from people who have the habit of making excuses. -George W. Carve
Being honest may not get you a lot of FRIENDS but it'll always get you the RIGHT ONES.
Most of us are just about as happy as we make up our minds to be. - Abraham Lincoln

God loves you more in a moment than anyone could in a lifetime.

You can't make footprints on the sands of time by sitting on your butt... and who wants to make buttprints?
Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm & constant. -Socrates
RT @FaithReeI: https://t.co/TiM3tE84CU
Why compare yourself with others? No one in the entire world can do a better job of being you than you.
RT @Epic_Women: A woman is like a tea bag: you cannot tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water. -Nancy Reagan
Why try and be fake when being real takes less effort?
It takes some courage to stand up and speak; it takes even more courage to open your mind and listen.
Take the first step in faith. You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step. -Martin Luther King Jr.
In life you are either a passenger or a pilot, it's your choice.
You can do anything if you have enthusiasm. Enthusiasm is the yeast that makes your hopes rise to the stars. -Henry Ford
RT @Sports_Greats: Do you know what my favorite part of the game is? The opportunity to play. -Mike Singletary
Keep calm, you may be weak but God is strong.
You always have a place to run to, always. The place is GOD
Let your smile change the world but never let the world change your smile.
We either win or we learn. https://t.co/1Vepq6voRi
Take responsibility for yourself.., because no one's going to take responsibility for you. -Tyra Banks
We plan the way we want to live, but only God makes us able to live it. It Pays to Take Life Seriously -Proverbs 16:9
See the good in every moment. https://t.co/q75VNQfPNO
Success is peace of mind which is a direct result of knowing u did your best to become the best that u are capable of being. -John Wooden
It is love that makes the impossible possible.
Life is what happens to you when you're busy making other plans. - John Lennon
To wish you were someone else is to waste the person you are.
A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for.

Do something now that will make the person you'll be tomorrow proud to have been the person you are today.
Do all the good you can, to as many people as you can, as often as you can.
Step through new doors. The majority of the time there's something fantastic on the other side.
You were born to make an impact.
Talent is God given. Be humble. Fame is man-given. Be grateful. Conceit is self-given. Be careful.
